senses.sense_definition: Any of several Middle Indo-Aryan languages derived from dialects of Old Indo-Aryan.

examples.text: Scholars analyze ancient texts written in <w>Prakrit</w> to trace the evolution of modern Indian languages.
The play features characters speaking in Sanskrit and various forms of <w>Prakrit</w>.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to the Prakrit languages or their literature.

examples.text: The museum displays several <w>Prakrit</w> inscriptions found on the temple walls.
Her research focuses on <w>Prakrit</w> poetry from the medieval period.
